source_text: The Mt Clere Project (75km²) is located within the Edmund Basin on Mt Clere Station, 190km north-northwest of Meekatharra and 725km north-east of Perth in Western Australia, with road access to the Project.
additional_details: The coverage area is for the Mt Clere Project, converted from 75 square kilometers to hectares (75 km² = 7500 ha).
